Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T1.NUM_APOLICE, T2.FONTE FROM SEGUROS.V0MESTSINI-V0ENDO T1, SEGUROS.V0MESTSINI-V0ENDO T2 WHERE t2.num_apolice = t1.num_apolice AND t2.nrendos = 0 AND t1.tipreg IN (:FI61W01.W-TIPREG-INICIAL, :FI61W01.W-TIPREG-FINAL) AND T1.CODPRODU = :CODPRODU ORDER BY t2.fonte END SQL
